title: Arabic 25
text: Vaunt not thyself over the poor, for I lead him on his way and behold thee in thy evil plight and confound thee forevermore.
teaser: Vaunt not thyself over the poor...

prev.title: Arabic 24
prev.text: Transgress not thy limits, nor claim that which beseemeth thee not. Prostrate thyself before the countenance of thy God, the Lord of might and power.

next.title: Arabic 26
next.text: How couldst thou forget thine own faults and busy thyself with the faults of others? Whoso doeth this is accursed of Me.
